text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $12$.
The length of the line $CD$ is $8$.
The measure of angle $ADE$ is $30$ degrees.
The point $E$ lies on the line $AB$.
The line $DE$ is perpendicular to the line $EA$.
The length of the line $DA$ is equal to the length of the line $CB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AE$, $BC$, $CD$, $DA$, $DE$, and $EB$, forming the trapezoid $ABCD$.
